root.static-content:
ViX-998

The ViX-998 is our premium flagship cog, capable of withstanding 100-5000lb of torque, meaning whatever you use this cog for-- this cog will get things done.

Every ViX-998 is guaranteed for life*, we pride ourselves in the quality of our cogs. We know that you rely on the precision of our parts. We've developed a forging process that reduces the shrink and expansion rates of each cog up to 0.0003mm

Specifications:

Quality Diameter Length Min-Pitch Max-Pitch Max-Torque
ViX-998 TI 13" 28.3" 4 48 1000lbs
ViX-998 AL 13" 28.3" 4 48 500lbs
ViX-998 ST 13" 28.3" 4 48 750lbs

* {normal wear, tear and extensive use. Only applies to Titanium (TI) and Steel (ST) models.}
